headline: Eli Lilly's Experimental Weight Loss Pill Succeeded in Its First Pivotal Trial. Is It Time to Buy?
summary: More than 2 out of 5 American adults are obese, according to the Centers for Disease Control.  With this figure in mind, it's no wonder Wall Street investment banks are telling anyone who will listen that sales of anti-obesity drugs could soar.  Last year, Morgan Stanley said the global market for obesity drugs could increase more than 15-fold to reach $144 billion by 2030.
